name: Teacher Dommy
description:
Looking for someone to come to your home once a week for guitar lessons for you orson/daughters to start or continue to learn how to play. If you or someone you know would like to teach private guitar lessons once a week in our home, let us know. Looking for three separate lessons, 30 minutes a piece once a week.
    Guitar lessons can be done succinct in one afternoon or space out during the week.

images.name: Hands-on Music lessons
images.description: I'm Skilled at teaching  absolute beginners to practise guitar playing and become a musical composer. I have played in bands and solo, professionally and for fun.

name: Haven Barber Shop
position: At Haven Beaty clinic barber we help the clients that we see take care of their hair and facial hair. We typically work primarily with male clients, but may also work with women in some our shop. When our barbers meet with a client, they’ll start by helping them to decide on what they’d like to do with their hair. We may recommend specific haircuts or styles that we imagine will suit our client well.

name: Haven Massage Spa
position:
Haven Massage Spa massage therapists have vast experience  treating muscular conditions, and helping to relieve muscle pain, stiffness, and tension in clients through hands-on manipulation.
    While focusing on the muscles, performing various kinds of massages, including Kenyan massage and deep tissue massage.We help the clients with sore muscles or those looking to simply relax and unwind.
